item.title: What Exactly Is A Mastodon, And Why Should You Give It A Shot?
item.description: What is a Mastodon? When most people think of social media, they think of Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and other similar platforms. However, individuals are becoming increasingly conscious that they are data miners with a large percentage of censored content. Is there another option, or do we have to completely leave social media? Fortunately, the answer is yes. Thanks to social media, we can connect with people online, and they should be open to us.
